existing_features.title: Build a frontend interface displaying the current game prediction with outcome, confidence meter, and timestamp
Add a button to generate new predictions on demand, fetching fresh prediction data from the backend
Create a prediction history view showing past predictions in a list or table format with dates, outcomes, and confidence levels
Apply a cohesive visual design theme with vibrant colors and modern card-based layout suitable for a gaming prediction application, ensuring consistent typography and spacing throughout
Add a 30-second countdown timer to the PredictionDisplay component that displays the remaining time until the next prediction period
Automatically generate a new prediction when the 30-second countdown timer reaches zero, triggering the existing generatePrediction mutation
Display the current period number in the PredictionDisplay component, incrementing with each 30-second cycle
Display the predicted number prominently in the PredictionDisplay component alongside the current Big/Small outcome prediction
Add the predicted number column to the PredictionHistory component's table view, showing the number for each past prediction

new_feature_requests.summary: Create OK Win game prediction code
Create a backend function that generates game predictions for OK Win, returning prediction data including predicted outcome, confidence level, and timestamp
Create a backend function to store prediction history, allowing users to save and retrieve past predictions with their results
Add 30-second automatic prediction period with countdown timer that generates new predictions when each period ends
Display the predicted number (not just big/small) for each period in the prediction display
Modify the backend Prediction type to include a predicted number field (0-9) in addition to the existing outcome field
